metadata.name: New Generic Credentials Added Via Cmdkey.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects usage of "cmdkey.exe" to add generic credentials. As an example, this can be used before connecting to an RDP session via command line interface.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cmdkey.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('cmdkey.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -g')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /g')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –g')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —g')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―g'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -u')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /u')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –u')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —u')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―u'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -p')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /p')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –p')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —p')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―p'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of "cmdkey.exe" to add generic credentials. As an example, this can be used before connecting to an RDP session via command line interface.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate usage for administration purposes Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1021.001/T1021.001.md#t1021001---remote-desktop-protocol
